stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Mural Reveals Lost Tale of Heroic War
stories.fantasy_story: In the northern realm of Rutland, an ancient mural has been unearthed. It depicts a forgotten version of the legendary Trojan War, differing from the tales sung by the famed bard, Homer. Instead, it seems to tell a story from the lost scrolls of Aeschylus, showing new scenes of heroes Achilles and Hector.

stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Unveil Dying Star's Luminous Farewell
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Wizards of the Celestial Spire have used their Scrying Orb to peer into the furthest reaches of the night sky. They witnessed a rare sight: a dying sun-shard, shrouded in a cosmic cloud known as the Egg Nebula. From its hidden core, twin beams of pure light burst forth, illuminating the heavens.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Mechanical Steed Folds for Easy Travel
stories.fantasy_story: The Tenways Clan has unveiled a marvel of engineering: a new enchanted mechanical steed called the CGO Compact. This clever contraption can twist and fold, allowing it to fit into the smallest merchant carriages or humble chambers. It features tiny wheels and collapsible parts, making travel across the Western Lands easier than ever.
